about_the_game:
Overview
Experience the freedom of a classic RPG within a cutting-edge, free-to-play, open-world, multiplayer online experience. Explore, fight, collect, build, and conquer alongside your friends, and against your enemies, without any pay-to-win elements, all while immersing yourself in the story of Eurone.

Explore the vast world of Eurone
On foot, mounted, through magic, or... flying!


Create your own class
Train and evolve in what pleases you! Combine various skills to make your hero unique!


Fight monsters
For those who choose to explore the world of Eurone, be prepared to battle or tame the wild and fantastical creatures that inhabit these lands.


Harvest resources
Mining, Skinning, Lumberjack, Herbalist, Inscription, Tamer, and much more... it's all up to you.


Find treasures
Long-forgotten relics and artifacts can be found in the most hidden, mysterious... and dangerous locations of Eurone.

legal_notice:
Copyright and Trademark Statement

I, André Ferreira, representative of UZMI Games studio, declare that we own the copyrights to all content of the game Tales of Shadowland, including but not limited to graphics, music, text, and source code.

Furthermore, I declare that the trademarks associated with the game, Tales of Shadowland, and the studio, UZMI Games, are either owned by us or we have legal permission for their use.

Any unauthorized use of the game content or trademarks will be subject to legal action as permitted by applicable law.
name: Tales Of Shadowland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160 / AMD CPU with 4 physical cores @ 3Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play.
